movies.title: Heimweh nach drüben
movies.plot: This TV movie focuses on an average East German citizen, who accidentally becomes a Cold War victim. Shortly before his wedding day, East German Stephan Busemann goes to West Germany to attend his brother Hubert's fiftieth birthday. At the same time, his son Martin and his daughter-in-law Bettina flee their communist home country in a balloon, what Stephan didn't know. As the East Germans believe he helped them to escape, he isn't allowed to return, so Martin writes a letter to the country's leader Erich Honecker. However, now the West Germans think that Stephan is a spy...
movies.simplePlot: This TV movie focuses on an average East German citizen, who accidentally becomes a Cold War victim. Shortly before his wedding day, East German Stephan Busemann goes to West Germany to ...

biography.bio: Wolfgang Stumph was born on January 31, 1946 in Radków, Dolnoslaskie, Poland. He is an actor and producer, known for Stubbe - Von Fall zu Fall (1995), Rabbit Without Ears (2007) and Go Trabi Go (1991). He has been married to Christine Stumph since 1973. They have two children.
biography.name: Wolfgang Stumph

biography.bio: Katrin Saß was born on October 23, 1956 in Schwerin, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress, known for Good Bye Lenin! (2003), Il était une fois un meurtre (2010) and Bürgschaft für ein Jahr (1981). She was previously married to Siegfried Kühn.
biography.name: Katrin Saß

biography.bio: Jürgen Tarrach was born on December 17, 1960 in Geilenkirchen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Casino Royale (2006), The Reader (2008) and Die Musterknaben (1997).
biography.name: Jürgen Tarrach

biography.bio: Steffen Groth was born on September 16, 1974 in Berlin, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Go for Zucker (2004), Le vent de l'aventure (1999) and Ninja Assassin (2009).
biography.name: Steffen Groth

biography.bio: Winnie Böwe was born on November 8, 1973 in Halle, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress, known for 3 (2010), Guerrière (2011) and Circle of Life (2004).
biography.name: Winnie Böwe

biography.bio: Petra Berndt was born on January 27, 1965 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany. She is an actress, known for A Case for B.A.R.Z. (2005), Le Tourbillon de l'amour (2005) and The Nasty Girl (1990).
biography.name: Petra Berndt

biography.bio: Bernd Michael Lade was born on December 24, 1964 in East Berlin, East Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Tatort (1970), Come Sweet Death (2000) and Dumm gelaufen (1997).
biography.name: Bernd Michael Lade

biography.bio: Franziska Troegner was born on July 18, 1954 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (2005), The Country Doctor (1987) and In Your Shoes (1995). She was previously married to Ulrich Thein.
biography.name: Franziska Troegner

biography.bio: Günter Junghans was born on July 14, 1941 in Leipzig, Germany. He was an actor, known for Les aventures de Werner Holt (1965), Schtonk (1992) and Held for Questioning (1983). He died on July 10, 2014 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Günter Junghans

biography.bio: Udo Schenk was born on April 11, 1953 in Wittenberge, German Democratic Republic. He is known for his work on In aller Freundschaft (1998), Don't Look for Me (2004) and Gruber's Journey (2008). He is married to Marina Krogull.
biography.name: Udo Schenk

biography.bio: Benjamin Morik was born in 1968 in Hamburg, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for Asudem (2007), Tatort (1970) and Das allerbeste Stück (2004).
biography.name: Benjamin Morik

biography.bio: Paul Faßnacht was born in 1949 in Tübingen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. He is an actor, known for The Lives of Others (2006), OP ruft Dr. Bruckner - Die besten Ärzte Deutschlands (1996) and Kebab Connection (2004).
biography.name: Paul Faßnacht

biography.bio: Rolf Kanies was born on December 21, 1957 in Bielefeld, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. He is an actor and producer, known for Downfall (2004), Hitman: Agent 47 (2015) and The Downfall of Berlin: Anonyma (2008).
biography.name: Rolf Kanies

biography.bio: Peter Fitz (born August 8th 1931 in Kaiserslautern, Germany) is mostly active in theatre. After his graduation from theatre school in 1970, he started as an actor for the Deutsches Schauspielhauses Hamburg (German Theatre Hamburg). From 1970 to 1986, he was a permanent actor for the Schaubühne Berlin (Berlin Theatre). He got awards for best German actor on stage in 1980 and 1983. In 1996, he received an award for best European stage actor. Though almost never a lead actor, Fitz also gained recognition for film in recent years. His most prominent roles are that of Alf Bertini in _"Bertinis, Die" (1989) (mini)_, the conservative father in 23 (1998) and as Weinrich in La boutique (1998). Recently he also starred as György Eszter in Béla Tarr's Les Harmonies Werckmeister (2000).
biography.name: Peter Fitz

biography.bio: Holger Daemgen was born on April 21, 1969 in Schwäbisch Gmünd, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. He is an actor, known for In aller Freundschaft (1998), Anne Frank (2001) and Die Garmisch-Cops (2012).
biography.name: Holger Daemgen
